channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Witkoff to meet Putin's envoy amid new U.S. sanctions on Russia
item.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin's special envoy Kirill Dmitriev is visiting the U.S. and is expected to meet White House envoy Steve Witkoff in Miami...

item.title: Young bettors drive gambling boom, but cracks are showing
item.description: Gen Z and millennials are driving the fastest growth in sports betting, but a decline may be on the horizon, according to TransUnion's latest U.S. gam...

item.title: Behind the Curtain: The ever-growing AI inequality gap
item.description: Good news: U.S. tech companies are attacking the AI race like a modern Manhattan Project — spending unfathomable money and time to beat China to super...

item.title: Vocal Trump supporter Lonsdale blasts crypto pardon
item.description: Joe Lonsdale, one of President Trump's loudest and richest supporters, spoke out against yesterday's pardon of crypto billionaire Changpeng "CZ" Zhao,...

item.title: Trump says he’s canceling trade negotiations with Canada over anti-tariff ad
item.description: President Donald Trump claimed Canada “fraudulently used” an advertisement that featured audio from a 1987 radio address by President Ronald Reagan cr...

item.title: WATCH: Bernie Sanders interview on The Axios Show
item.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) critiqued the Democratic Party, blasted the pro-Israel lobby and warned about dangers of the AI revolution during an inter...

item.title: Social Security cost-of-living rise in line with inflation but trails key expenses
item.description: The annual cost-of-living adjustment is in line with overall inflation, but it trails categories such as energy and health care.

item.title: U.S. kills six in latest strike on alleged drug boat, Hegseth says
item.description: The operation marked the 10th known attack on suspected smugglers from Latin America, pushing the reported death toll to at least 43.

item.title: Republicans who once opposed Trump’s military impulses now lower their guard
item.description: The president’s talk of further escalating his campaign in Latin America poses uncomfortable questions for some in Congress.

item.title: Here are the donors contributing to Trump’s White House ballroom
item.description: Companies such as Google, Amazon and Meta are on the list of donors to the planned 90,000-square-foot ballroom. The East Wing has been demolished as p...

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
